version_description:
- new design with better map integration
- new tab "Map"
- bug fixes and changes based on customer feedback

- new design with better map integration
- new tab "Map"
- bug fixes and changes based on customer feedback
include / exclude train or bus journeys in the search
include / exclude train or bus journeys in the search

In addition to the known timetable information, now you can purchase and download e-tickets on your phone!
- ticket purchase from timetable information (after choice of ride)
- direct purchase of tickets (without timetable information)
- registration for the ticket purchase
- management of personal data of the consumer account
- revised layout
- bugfixes

In addition to the known timetable information, now you can purchase and download e-tickets on your phone!
- ticket purchase from timetable information (after choice of ride)
- direct purchase of tickets (without timetable information)
- registration for the ticket purchase
- management of personal data of the consumer account
